name: Delivery of materials
description:
Delivery of materials

The objective of the video game is to deliver materials for upgrade a box of stuff.

How to play a videogame

Is easy playing this a game, after click to play-button, start a game; click to box of the material that is requested by the wagon but you do before the time is out. There's a shop, in the shop you can upgrade a box of materials; the upgrade consist in reduction of product time of materials.

Language

In this game is enable only Italian language but the game i understandable.

Credits
